meta.description: Optimize the production of regular and premium skin cream batches to maximize the number of people treated.

sets.name: BATCH_TYPES
sets.description: Types of skin cream batches produced by the company.

params.name: medicinal_requirement
params.description: Units of medicinal ingredients required per batch type.

params.name: rehydration_requirement
params.description: Units of rehydration product required per batch type.

params.name: medicinal_available
params.description: Total units of medicinal ingredients available.

params.name: rehydration_available
params.description: Total units of rehydration product available.

params.name: people_treated
params.description: Number of people treated per batch type.

vars.name: batches
vars.description: Number of batches produced for each batch type.

objective.name: max_people_treated
objective.description: Maximize the total number of people treated by producing batches.

constraints.name: medicinal_constraint
constraints.description: Total medicinal ingredients used must not exceed available supply.

constraints.name: rehydration_constraint
constraints.description: Total rehydration product used must not exceed available supply.

constraints.name: regular_less_than_premium
constraints.description: The number of regular batches must be less than the number of premium batches.

constraints.name: min_regular_batches
constraints.description: At least 10 regular batches must be produced.
